Content:: This article documents the chronology and epidemiology of SARS-CoV-2 in December 2020, the virus which causes the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and is responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic. The first human cases of COVID-19 were identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019. World Health Organization weekly report:[1] World Health Organization weekly report:[52] World Health Organization weekly report:[100] World Health Organization weekly report:[153] World Health Organization weekly report:[214] Countries and territories that confirmed their first cases during December 2020: By 31 December 2020, only the following countries and territories have not reported any cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections: Africa Asia Europe Oceania
Title: Timeline of the COVID-19 pandemic in December 2020 - Wikipedia
